RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Register ed Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALK DIRTY with the second flight near the inside, shifted out on the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead past the furlong marker then drew off under a strong hand ride while drifting out to win going away. DREAM TO WIN trailed early while saving ground into the turn, swung wide, rallied determinedly out past the middle of the racetrack and got up for second. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) broke in front, battled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then was outfinished. TEAM GOLD DIGGER matched strides for the lead two wide into the stretch then weakened. HERO'S DAUGHTER had good early speed, swung wide and lost ground. FREE TO RUN was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Drug (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, rallied past mid track, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, rallied 3 wide, full of run, drifted, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Free to Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, swung wide, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Team Gold Digger
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASCABRIA rushed up along the rail to make the lead just past the seven sixteenths pole, drew clear on the turn, widened into the stretch while drifting out to the six path and won under a strong hand ride. ROMANTIC JEWEL bumped at the start, battled for the early lead two wide, chased the winner from there, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack giving up ground then came on again late under right handed urging to gamely gain second. BISCOTTINI was bumped at the start, trailed through the turn, offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then was outfinished for second. W H LITTLE MISS GO had good early speed three wide and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Cascabria
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside, clear turn, drifted 6path, strong hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, battled 2 wide, drifted 9path, gamely gained 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Biscottini
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, middle move rail, outfinished for second

ENTRY.NAME: W H Little Miss Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXACTITUDE sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under a strong hand ride. LARSA chased the winner two wide and finished well clear for second. DANCING GRACE stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, altered course to the five path near the sixteenth pole and lost ground. EASTER PRIDE well placed, failed to respond. CEE CEE'S GOT THIS was no factor. SASSY POWER had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Exactitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, altered course 5path late, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Larsa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Cee Cee's Got This
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs.A Race S ince February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEBULOSA sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and won under brisk handling. MANNFORD chased the winner three wide, drifted to the middle of the racetrack and finished second best. RECKLESS L J chased the winner from the three path, drifted to the six path in the stretch, finished determinedly and returned bleeding from the nostrils. SHOW SLIDING HOME offered a mild bid in the five path into the stretch then leveled off. CRAZYCANTBERIGHTED was no factor. SPIN DOCTOR trailed from the start, stopped in upper stretch, was eased to the wire and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, unchallenged, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move 5path, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless L J
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3path, drifted 6path, finished determinedly, bled,

ENTRY.NAME: Mannford
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, second best mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Crazycantberighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, stopped top upper stretch, eased wire, walked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT WARSHIP stumbled a stride out of the gate, trailed into the turn, angled outside, circled his field with a burst of speed to make the lead at the furlong marker and drew off to win as much the best. THE COACHMAN stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly three wide nearing the furlong marker then was no match for the winner. GUN LAP never far back, rallied rail along the rail through the turn to make the lead entering the stretch and finished with good courage. DECEITFUL ANTHONY pressed the pace four then three wide into the stretch and was outfinished. MUTINY away alertly, set a pressured pace off the rail in the two path into the stretch then weakened. EL MARRO had speed through the turn, swung wide and lost ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Mutiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2path, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, swung wide, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Warship
ENTRY.OWNER: Mitten Mates LLC and D & D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, trailed, circled field, closed fast, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Lap
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied rail, led between calls, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Deceitful Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 4-3wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide top lane, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio RegisteredFoals Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAT'S RHYTHM waited along the behind a trio of horses battling for the lead through the turn, shifted out to the thee path when a hole opened up entering the stretch, responded with a burst of speed to make the lead past the furlong marker and won going away. BOOGIE BOOGEE battled for the lead two wide into the stretch, gained the advantage then was no match for the winner. PENNY SHOTS allowed to settle, found her best stride late four wide. BISCAYNE BAY unhurried early, closed a gap late three wide. AUJARA had speed from the start, loomed boldly four wide midway on the turn, matched strides into the stretch then was outfinished. GAIL'S DANCER contested the lead along the inside into the stretch then weakened. RAINBOW SHIP trailed into the stretch, swung wide and passed tiring rivals. SUSHI Q veered out at the start, rushed to contention two wide soon thereafter, checked repeatedly behind horses while lacking racing room and dropped back in the final furlong. QUEEN AIR pressed the pace three wide into the turn, drew on even terms for the lead nearing the quarter pole then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Air
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, drew even 1/4 pole, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: waited rail, angled out 3path top lane, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, checked repeatedly behind foes, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Gail's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Boogie Boogee
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Rainbow Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Biscayne Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: closed gap late 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Les s Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALFIO raced three wide through the clubhouse turn, dropped inside, saved ground into the far turn, shifted out three wide, made the lead near the quarter pole, shook clear entering the stretch and prevailed under mild left handed urging. DOWNTOWN CONNECTOR unhurried early, loomed boldly four wide nearing the quarter pole and finished well clear for second. TIMESATAPPIN slow early, improved position into the stretch and was the best of the rest. MODUS hopped hitting the gate at the start and was no threat. TONKAWA SPRINGS well placed, failed to respond. LED TASSO dueled for the lead along the inside for six furlongs then weakened. SWELTER failed to menace. GIACOMETTI matched strides for the lead three then two wide into the far turn and was used up. RED COMET was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Swelter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Modus
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Connector
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, loomed boldly 4 wide 1/4 pole, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Led Tasso
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Timesatappin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, middle move, best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Giacometti
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2wide 2nd turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Alfio
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground backstretch, shifted 3w, quick move, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Tonkawa Springs
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Les s Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY STREAK stalked the pace two then three wide into the stretch, surged late under left handed urging to make the lead and just lasted while extended. ELLIOT THE DRAGON never far back, closed rapidly four wide through deep stretch and just missed. COWTOWN BOSS chased the pace from the inside into the stretch, shifted out to the three path late and finished determinedly. MOESTER slow early, found his best stride late outside. ZAKARIA broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch along the inside then was outfinished. STUNT MAN well placed, went evenly. TIDE RISING failed to menace. SERENDIPITOUS was no factor. KEEPING SCORE was no threat. CHOCOLATE PHILLING had brief speed. RUMBLE STRIP RON was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Elliot the Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 4w, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowtown Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, angled out 3path late, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Philling
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Stunt Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Moester
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Streak
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2-3wide, surged late, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Zakaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, outfinished
